SELECT r.id,r.type,r.role_name roleName,r.role_code roleCode,r.status, r.create_time createTime, r.create_user createUser, r.modified_time modifiedTime, r.modified_user modifiedUser FROM q_admins a RIGHT JOIN q_admins_role rar ON a.id = rar.aid RIGHT JOIN q_role r ON rar.rid = r.id WHERE a.username LIKE #{username};
